SPONSOR A SCHOOL

Join The Community

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

SPONSOR A SCHOOL

By becoming a partner and donating to build schools for people in need, you can help break the cycle of poverty and provide a brighter future for generations to come. Your contribution can make a significant impact on the lives of these individuals and communities, and help them realize their full potential. Let's work together to make education a reality for all!. As a business partner with us, you will create a lasting impact that reaches far beyond the construction of building a school for people in need.

As a part of our commitment to proving every project, we provide information and photos of the children you’ve helped.

$ 4 , 0 0 0 =

BUSINESS

SPONSOR A SCHOOL

Business partners are committed to incorporate the story of S4S into their business model and give consistently throughout the year. When you partner with us, you will receive personal concierge service with our development administrator, co-branded materials, and new social media content each quarter. Whether you want to fund schools in a specific country or transform an entire community, we will walk alongside you to develop your own social impact program.

Reach out directly to our development administrator to find out more about the business partner program and join The Community.

JOIN THE FOUNDATION

GIVE MONTHLY

We invite you to be a part of a community that’s passionate about faithfully giving shelter every month called The Foundation.

At Schooling for all, when we build a school, it starts with a solid foundation. Now, we’re asking for your help to lay the financial foundation for us to continue our work by giving every month. Your monthly gifts provide consistent wages to our local laborers that work to ensure that schools are constructed every month in every community we serve. Members of The Foundation are generous, passionate, and determined people—like you.
